I can’t say that this dress is made well, but neither were the Mexican dresses we wore decades ago. BUT at least the old dresses were a cotton that you could not see through. However, it does not circle the dress so the back is very thin. Having said that, it’s a cute dress and I’ve worn it already. I just had to wear a short half-slip under it. It’s not going to hold up to many washings, but it’s also not going to get a lot of wear so I think it will do what I want.
